mapper.sql: ID, MAT_ENG_ID, CERT_TYPE, CERT_CODE, CERT_MAX_LEVEL, TECH_NAME, TECH_PT, TECH_JOP, DEP_NAME, DEP_PT, DEP_JOP, LICENCE_AUTHORITH, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, CERT_STATUS, ATTACH_CERT
mapper.insert: insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_ENG (ID, MAT_ENG_ID, CERT_TYPE, CERT_CODE, CERT_MAX_LEVEL, TECH_NAME, TECH_PT, TECH_JOP, DEP_NAME, DEP_PT, DEP_JOP, LICENCE_AUTHORITH, EXP_START_DATE, EXP_END_DATE, CERT_STATUS, ATTACH_CERT) values (#{id}, #{matEngId}, #{certType}, #{certCode}, #{certMaxLevel}, #{techName}, #{techPt}, #{techJop}, #{depName}, #{depPt}, #{depJop}, #{licenceAuthorith}, #{expStartDate}, #{expEndDate}, #{certStatus}, #{attachCert})

insert into T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_ENG
ID,
MAT_ENG_ID,
CERT_TYPE,
CERT_CODE,
CERT_MAX_LEVEL,
TECH_NAME,
TECH_PT,
TECH_JOP,
DEP_NAME,
DEP_PT,
DEP_JOP,
LICENCE_AUTHORITH,
EXP_START_DATE,
EXP_END_DATE,
CERT_STATUS,
ATTACH_CERT,
#{id},
#{matEngId},
#{certType},
#{certCode},
#{certMaxLevel},
#{techName},
#{techPt},
#{techJop},
#{depName},
#{depPt},
#{depJop},
#{licenceAuthorith},
#{expStartDate},
#{expEndDate},
#{certStatus},

select sys_guid() from dual
mapper.update:
update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_ENG
MAT_ENG_ID = #{matEngId},
CERT_TYPE = #{certType},
CERT_CODE = #{certCode},
CERT_MAX_LEVEL = #{certMaxLevel},
TECH_NAME = #{techName},
TECH_PT = #{techPt},
TECH_JOP = #{techJop},
DEP_NAME = #{depName},
DEP_PT = #{depPt},
DEP_JOP = #{depJop},
LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith},
EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate},
EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate},
CERT_STATUS = #{certStatus},
ATTACH_CERT = #{attachCert},
where ID = #{id}

update T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_ENG set MAT_ENG_ID = #{matEngId}, CERT_TYPE = #{certType}, CERT_CODE = #{certCode}, CERT_MAX_LEVEL = #{certMaxLevel}, TECH_NAME = #{techName}, TECH_PT = #{techPt}, TECH_JOP = #{techJop}, DEP_NAME = #{depName}, DEP_PT = #{depPt}, DEP_JOP = #{depJop}, LICENCE_AUTHORITH = #{licenceAuthorith}, EXP_START_DATE = #{expStartDate}, EXP_END_DATE = #{expEndDate}, CERT_STATUS = #{certStatus}, ATTACH_CERT = #{attachCert} where ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_CERT_ENG c,T_SES_SMS_SUPPLIER_MAT_ENG m WHERE c.MAT_ENG_ID=m.ID AND m.SUPPLIER_ID=#{supplierId}
